name: Dashformer
description:
Description:

Try to get to the end of the level without hitting any red spikes! Double jump and dash to traverse to the goal!

Controls:

Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Down Arrow - Fast Fall

Left Shift - Dash [can only dash once in the air]

Up Arrow - Jump

Up Arrow (in air) - Double Jump [can only double jump once in the air]

R - Restart level

Q - Quit
